charges.charge_description: Count 1ss - Assault with Intent to Commit Murder; Count 3ss - 18:922(g)(1) Felon in Possession of a Firearm and Ammunition

charges.charge_disposition: Six (6) months imprisonment on Count 1 and sixty (60) months imprisonment on Count 3, all to be served concurrently; three (3) years supervised release on Count 3; $125.00 special assessment
